panels.description: Percentage of uptime during the most recent $interval period.  Change the period with the 'interval' dropdown above.
panels.title: Uptime [$interval]

panels.description: Sum of errors in requests to the SNMP exporter during the most recent $interval period.  Change the period with the 'interval' dropdown above.

panels.description: Total PDUs returned across all selected target jobs and target instances. Averaged over the selected time period in Grafana.
panels.title: Total PDUs returned

panels.description: Duration of collections by the SNMP exporter by module.
panels.title: Collection Duration, $interval rate

panels.description: Unexpected Go types in a PDU.
panels.title: Unexpected PDUs, $interval rate

panels.description: Sum of scrape durations for a specific instance.
panels.title: Scrape Duration by Instance

panels.description: Sum of scrape durations for a specific job.
